metrics_conclusion: Mania has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Mania is written in the key of C Minor.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 3rd most popular key among Minor keys and     the 9th most popular  among all keys. Minor keys, along with major keys, are a common choice for popular music.  The three most important chords, built off the 1st, 4th and 5th scale degrees are all minor chords (C minor, F minor, and G minor).

See the C Minor Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!

metadata.editComments: This song should be in 6/8 at 117 BPM. I had to use 3/4 234 BPM as a substitute. Because of that, the automated chord rhythms are very different than what the actual song should sound like. But the chords and notes are still right.

To transcribe the chords, I analyzed the audio starting at about 24 seconds in, because that's where it was easiest to isolate the chords. For some reason the arpeggio doesn't perfectly match up with the ascending pattern this song is going for.
